channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [PIG-1262] Additional findbugs and javac warnings
item.description: After a while, we have introduced some new findbugs and javacc warnings. Will fix them in this Jira.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12437127/PIG-1262-1.patch
against trunk revision 916429.

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no tests are needed for this patch.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to cause Findbugs to fail.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

-1 core tests. The patch failed core unit tests.

+1 contrib tests. The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/job/Pig-Patch-h8.grid.sp2.yahoo.net/226/testReport/
Console output: http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/job/Pig-Patch-h8.grid.sp2.yahoo.net/226/console
